column2: the application and cannot maintain the application.

column3: Same decision was followed in cases Brown and Company Ltd.

column2: V s.  Rathnayake  (1990)  1 SLR  92,  The  Attorney General vs.  Wilson
Balasingham case, failure  to  comply with Rules is  indeed a failure  to

column1: show  due  diligence.  The  appeal  was  accordingly  dismissed.  In  the

column2: cases  of Facy vs.  Sanoon  and Others  (2003)  2  SLR,  and Jeganathan
vs.  Sajyath (2003)  2 SLR 372 same decision has beenfollowed.
